entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who has just seen a friend of his and is trying to avoid something. He is described as being firm in his decision.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as someone Harry pulls after him into the crowd. She is not described in detail.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a friend of Harry's who has just escaped from Cormac under the mistletoe. She looks dishevelled and like she has fought her way out of Devil's Snare.

entities.name: cormac
entities.description: Cormac is mentioned as someone Hermione has just escaped from. He is not described in detail.

relationships.description: Harry pulls Luna after him into the crowd.
Hermione is a friend of Harry's.
